text: Ion "Țop" Voinescu (18 April 1929 – 9 March 2018) was a Romanian footballer. He was often thought as one of the finest goalkeepers Romania has ever produced. Voinescu has won 22 caps for Romania, with his only honor being representing his country at the 1952 Summer Olympics. Voinenscu worked as a goalkeeper coach for his former club, Steaua București. On 9 March 2018, Voinescu died at the age of 88.”Țop” Voinescu s-a stins! Fostul mare portar al Stelei și al naționalei avea 88 de ani. digisport.ro Ion Voinescu , fostul portar al naționalei de fotbal, a murit. dcnews.ro A murit fostul portar legendar al Stelei, Ion Voinescu. gsp.ro ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Romanian footballers
title: Ion Voinescu
